video.title: Alex Kurilin on Understanding the Tradeoffs of a Language - Senior Developer Skills
video.description:
You can find out more information about Alex at frontrowed.com or follow him on Twitter at @alex_kurilin. Acknowledgment to Deborah Ahn for drawing the intro sketch.

Free Code Camp is a community of people who learn to code, then practice by building projects for nonprofits. Learn Full-stack JavaScript, build a portfolio, and get great references with our open source community.

Join our community at https://freecodecamp.com
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/freecodecamp
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/freecodecamp
Follow Quincy on Quora: https://www.quora.com/Quincy-Larson

topLevelComment.author: bitmonki
topLevelComment.text:
Supercool, never seen like this before - Elementing key things from an interview and explaining it.
please do more :D

topLevelComment.author: Patrick McCaffrey
topLevelComment.text: That was awesome! The code examples to explain parts in more depth was so good.

topLevelComment.author: George Nurijanian
topLevelComment.text: Really cool that you jump out of the convo briefly to explain the concepts! Great vid thank you very much.

topLevelComment.author: Raf Naegels
topLevelComment.text: when you make notes for use that are hard to read. try first writing them down before you're going to encircle them.

replies.author: Open Source Guide
replies.text: Thanks for the feedback.  Yes, my handwriting can be hard to read.  I'll work on that.

topLevelComment.author: Greenheart492
topLevelComment.text: Great work! I really like this video format :)

topLevelComment.author: Dennis Knie
topLevelComment.text: Move your mic away from your keyboard and you need something in your room to dampen the echo.

replies.author: Open Source Guide
replies.text: Thanks for the feedback.  I'll think about how to reduce the typing sounds from the keyboard.

topLevelComment.author: Dan W
topLevelComment.text: Great video! I enjoyed how you would take the time to explain in more detail what was being talked about.

replies.author: Open Source Guide
replies.text: Thank you!  I'm glad the explanations were helpful.

topLevelComment.author: zeroxcub
topLevelComment.text: Can we get the example code, there is something that make me unease about it

replies.author: Open Source Guide
replies.text: Sure, if you email me, I'll send it to you.

topLevelComment.author: larrym
topLevelComment.text: static typing is not a replacement for unit testing. Just because it compiles doesn't mean it's correct ...

replies.author: zeroxcub
replies.text: Totally agree with you, and I'd like to add that static typing is great but it's seems to me that the issue mentioned by Alex isn't even related to dynamic typing.

replies.author: Fernando Garibaldi
replies.text: he said that in the video
